description: Free League Publishing has announced a partnership with Italian game studio Two Little Mice (2LM) for the cinematic RPG Outgunned. The game is now available through Free League’s Workshop sub-label, which focuses on externally developed titles. The Outgunned core rulebook, along with expansions Action Flicks and World of Killers, the mini-campaign Project Medusa, and a...
title: Free League Partners with Two Little Mice for Cinematic RPG Outgunned
